name: ORS National Prisoners in Quarantine Report
description:
The report returns a summary list for all establishments who have prisoners in Quarantine. The first tab shows a summary of prisoners effected along with a % against total population. The final tabs provide a breakdown of each prisoner effected at each establishment.
HQ0023 - v00.00.01 Last Modified: 25/03/20

dataset.name: Quarantine Alerts
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION AS ALERT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.EXPIRY_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_STATUS FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_ALERTS AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN = 'ALERT_CODE' OR AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code
